title: Families of Homicide Victims Urge Community to Share Info on Murders
body:
The
families of two murder victims who were shot at a business in the Landover area
are asking for the community’s assistance as detectives continue to work on
making arrest(s) in the case.  On
December 12, 2020, patrol officers responded to the 8600 block of Old Ardmore
Road for a shooting. Twenty-two-year-old Leon Frazier of Washington, D.C died
on the scene. Several days later, 27-year-old Shantara Sheffield of Woodbridge,
Virginia, died of her injuries. The preliminary investigation revealed the
victims were attending a gathering being held at a business when the shooting
took place. Please take a few moments to hear from their families.If the video does not display, please click If
you have info, please call detectives at 301-516-2512. Callers wishing to
remain anonymous may call Crime Solvers at 1-866-411-TIPS (8477), go online at ,
or use the “P3 Tips” mobile app (search “P3 Tips” in the Apple Store or Google
Play to download the app onto your mobile device.) Please refer to case number
20-0058187.
